meanings.sent1: Every crewmate on the ship has a specific job to do.
meanings.sent2: The crewmate helped hoist the sails on the boat.
meanings.sent3: The crewmate accidentally tied their shoelaces together and tripped overboard.
meanings.sent4: She was the captain's right-hand crewmate, always ready to assist.
meanings.sent5: The crewmate's cheerful demeanor lifted everyone's spirits during the long voyage.

meanings.definition: A person who works as part of a team on a ship or aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The crewmate navigated the plane through stormy weather.
meanings.sent2: Each crewmate had a vital role in ensuring the ship's safe journey.
meanings.sent3: The crewmate challenged the captain to a dance-off on the deck.
meanings.sent4: She was a reliable crewmate, always there to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The crewmate's laughter echoed across the deck, bringing joy to all.
